Seniors need help completing your FAFSA? We have 3 resources to help you get your FAFSA completed for free:

If you cannot make FAFSA Day please consider going to UNCG. UNCG is hosting their own FASFA Nights every Tuesday from 5-7pm. They will continue this initiative from now until the middle of November. Please call their financial aid office for more details.

State Employee Credit Union Banks are also taking appointments for the month of November to help complete your FAFSA for free! Please call your local branch for more information.

Snow Day Three Haiku 🤓
Main roads are improved
School road and side roads are not
Roads will freeze no school

PCHS will be closed for students and staff Wednesday December 12th, 2018.

Coach Free and I just left campus and driving many of the roads in Guilford County and Greensboro. We take these decisions very seriously. While the main roads are in good shape many side roads and neighborhoods are still very much hard to navigate and in some areas impassable!

Our school roads and lots are one sheet of solid ice. Driving and walking on campus is dangerous. We have two plow crews who will be working the campus this afternoon and tomorrow to ensure the safety of all students and staff. Also, all melting that occurs today will freeze as the lows will be around 18 tomorrow and will not reach 32 until mid to late morning. All these factors considered we think it is best to take one more day to make sure conditions are safe for everyone. As we would love to be in school, days can be made up but accidents have lasting effects. #staysafe
